author: Pradeesh Chandran
text:
The Budget presented by Finance Minister Arun Jaitley contained a slew of measures to boost domestic IT business though he did not announce any sops for the sector.

In his third Budget, Mr. Jaitley announced that the government will introduce a new Digital Literacy Mission Scheme for rural India covering about six crore additional households within the next three years.

However, he said the details of this scheme would be spelt out separately.

The announcement by the finance minister will boost the ambitious Digital India programme of Prime Minister Narendra Modi.

The national land record modernisation programme has also been revamped.
title: Budget to boost domestic IT biz
